title: Each Zodiac Sign's Strengths and Weaknesses

steps.title: The lion is a natural leader, but can be self-centered.
steps.content: The lion is a natural leader, but can be self-centered. Confident and charming, Leo naturally takes charge. They want to feel like they’re important, and they always want to be right. In the same vein, Leo wants to be the center of attention. They love praise and compliments, and have a tendency to be selfish. Dates: July 22nd to August 22nd Element: Fire Ruling planet: Sun Most compatible with: Aries, Sagittarius, Libra

steps.title: The goat is a hard worker, but can be manipulative.
steps.content: The goat is a hard worker, but can be manipulative. Capricorn is practical and ambitious. They tend to care a lot about their careers. Capricorn is often calculated and will arrange things for their own benefit, even choosing partners that can do something for them. And, their tendency to be blunt can hurt people’s feelings. Dates: December 22nd to January 19th Element: Earth Ruling planet: Saturn Most compatible with : Taurus, Virgo, Scorpio

steps.title: The scorpion is a great problem solver, but can be suspicious of others.
steps.content: The scorpion is a great problem solver, but can be suspicious of others. Focused and determined, Scorpio can unravel mysteries and find solutions. However, they’re slow to trust. Scorpio’s tendency to see and sense so much in other people can make them a bit paranoid. Dates: October 23rd to November 21st Element: Water Ruling planet: Mars & Pluto Most compatible with : Pisces, Capricorn, Cancer

steps.title: The ram is courageous, but can be impulsive.
steps.content: The ram is courageous, but can be impulsive. Aries isn’t afraid of conflict and has no trouble standing up for themselves and the people around them. Aries is an aggressive sign. Their temper, impatience, and impulsiveness can lead to some trouble. Dates: March 21st to April 19th Element: Fire Ruling planet: Mars Most compatible with : Leo, Gemini, Sagittarius

steps.title: The bull is diligent, but can also be materialistic.
steps.content: The bull is diligent, but can also be materialistic. The determined Taurus is hardworking, dependable, and patient. This thick-skinned, practical sign tends to get stuck in their ways. Taurus is also into status symbols. They love money and the comforts and luxuries it can provide. Dates: April 19th to May 20th Element: Earth Ruling planet: Venus Most compatible with : Taurus, Virgo, Capricorn

steps.title: The archer is optimistic, but can be flighty.
steps.content: The archer is optimistic, but can be flighty. Sagittarius always sees the glass half-full and enjoys exploring the world. They love to have fun and be free. When things get boring or tough, though, Sagittarius has a tendency to run away. They aren’t the best at fulfilling their promises or following through on commitments. Dates: November 22nd to December 21st Element: Fire Ruling planet: Jupiter Most compatible with : Aries, Gemini, Libra

steps.title: The virgin is practical, but can be pretty critical.
steps.content: The virgin is practical, but can be pretty critical. Virgo is known for being careful and cautious. They love to give advice, and always think they’re right. Sometimes, their know-it-all attitude can hurt or annoy the people around them. Dates: August 23rd to September 22nd Element: Earth Ruling planet: Mercury Most compatible with: Taurus, Capricorn, Virgo

steps.title: The scales sign is fair, but can carry a grudge.
steps.content: The scales sign is fair, but can carry a grudge. As an Air sign, Libra is an intellectual that seeks balance. They’re very diplomatic. A Libra’s quest for truth and justice can lead them to display vindictive behaviors, and they’re not one to let go of things. Dates: September 23rd to October 22nd Element: Air Ruling planet: Venus Most compatible with : Gemini, Sagittarius, Leo

steps.title: The water-bearer is a humanitarian, but can be temperamental.
steps.content: The water-bearer is a humanitarian, but can be temperamental. Aquarius is very intellectual. They often use their clever mind to help others. On the flip side, Aquarius can be self-righteous and they don’t like to compromise. Dates: January 21st to February 18th Element: Air Ruling planet: Saturn & Uranus Most compatible with : Gemini, Sagittarius, Libra

steps.title: The crab is caring, but can be overly sensitive.
steps.content: The crab is caring, but can be overly sensitive. Cancer loves to care for and emotionally support others. They’re loyal and protective of their loved ones. The crab is prone to changing moods, though. They tend to take things personally and get defensive. Dates: June 21st to July 22nd Element: Water Ruling planet: Moon Most compatible with : Scorpio, Pisces, Taurus

steps.title: The twins sign is intelligent, but can be indecisive.
steps.content: The twins sign is intelligent, but can be indecisive. Gemini is an air sign, which means they love to be intellectually engaged. This sign tends to be dual-minded, so they see both sides of everything. That means a Gemini changes their minds all the time. Their indecisiveness and tendency to flip-flop can be frustrating to those around them. Dates: May 20th to June 21st Element: Air Ruling planet: Mercury Most compatible with : Libra, Leo, Aquarius

steps.title: The fish is compassionate, but can be moody.
steps.content: The fish is compassionate, but can be moody. Pisces is kind-hearted and caring. They will always show up when you need them. The fish is sensitive, though, and gets hurt easily. Pisces' caring nature also means they have a tendency to get pulled into drama. Dates: February 19th to March 20th Element: Water Ruling planet: Neptune Most compatible with : Taurus, Cancer, Scorpio
